import React, { useContext } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import Lists from "./List" import styles from './product.module.css' import CartContext from "./Store/cart-context" function Product() { let ctx = useContext(CartContext) const { productId } = useParams() const products = Lists.find(prod => prod.id == productId) return (

{products.title}

Price: â‚¦{products.price}

Description: {products.description}

) } export default Product
